attributes.action: Both QE Class aircraft carriers should enter into RN service
attributes.additional_details:
On Wednesday 2nd October 2013 the Defence Secretary Philip Hammond said that the cost of operating the second Queen Elizabeth Class aircraft carrier would amount to an annual running cost of £70million.

He has said that the money will have to be found from somewhere else, but with the withdraw from Afghanistan and current aid to India due to stop in 2015, I beleive no cuts would have to be made and operating both carriers is an option that politicains should consider now and not in the next SDSR in 2015.
